title: Duchess
name: Constance Morlande
summary: A noblewoman turned monster, the Duchess is a formidable fencer who has embraced the Crimson Curse inflicted upon her by the Countess. She now seeks vengeance against the curse-inflicted court, particularly the Countess, while finding an uneasy alliance with the Heirs and fighters of the Hamlet.
history: Born into nobility, Constance lived a life of luxury and became the court's finest fencer. She developed a rivalry with the Countess, who later disappeared for years. Upon receiving an invitation to a party in the Ancestor's courtyard along with a chalice of blood, Constance became infected with the Crimson Curse. Now transformed, she seeks revenge against the Baron, the Viscount, and especially the Countess.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

equipment: Tattered dress reinforced with iron plates

clothing.headwear: Large, angular helmet that hides everything but her toothy mouth

notes: Finds comfort in her monstrous form
Considers her beast form more representative of her true self
